gapAnalysis.summary: Sample summary: Strong technical depth and execution; opportunities in system design visibility and leadership narrative. A 90-day focus on cross-team ownership and written artifacts would close the main gaps.

gaps.title: Limited visible artifacts
gaps.observation: Few design docs or post-mortems in the sample data.
gaps.requirement: Produce at least one high-signal artifact per quarter.
gaps.closingAction: Draft a one-pager for the next project and share in a team channel.

gaps.title: Cross-team ownership
gaps.observation: Experience is mostly within a single team.
gaps.requirement: Demonstrate impact across teams or stakeholders.
gaps.closingAction: Volunteer for one cross-team initiative and document outcomes.

phase1.label: Phase 1
actions: Create one design doc or RFC

gapAnalysis.promotionNarrative: I drove [X] to completion, improved [Y] by [Z], and created visible artifacts (design doc, post-mortem) that aligned the team. I am ready for [next level] because I have demonstrated [evidence].
